ids_info.name: b_field_non_axisymmetric
ids_info.description: Vacuum 3d error magnetic field (the full 3d magnetic field with the axisymmetric components subtracted)

b_field_non_axisymmetric/configuration.documentation: In case of a constant (single time slice) b_field description, name of the corresponding scenario/configuration. Within b_field_non_axisymmetric IDS: Vacuum 3d error magnetic field (the full 3d magnetic field with the axisymmetric components subtracted).

Value of (b_field_max-b_field_min)/(b_field_max+b_field_min), where b_field_max resp. b_field_min) is the maximum (resp. minimum) of the magnetic field amplitude over a 2pi rotation in toroidal angle phi at a given R, Z position. Within b_field_non_axisymmetric IDS: Vacuum 3d error magnetic field (the full 3d magnetic field with the axisymmetric components subtracted). Within time_slice container: Set of time slices. Within field_map container: Description of the error field map.
